Package gobblin.kafka.schemareg

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    KafkaSchemaRegistry<K,S>
    An interface for a Kafka Schema Registry Classes implementing this interface will typically be constructed by a KafkaSchemaRegistryFactory and should have a constructor that takes a Properties object as a parameter.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CachingKafkaSchemaRegistry<K,S>
    An implementation that wraps a passed in schema registry and caches interactions with it
    ConfigDrivenMd5SchemaRegistry
    A SchemaRegistry that hands out MD5 based ids based on configuration Can be configured to be initialized with a single schema name, value pair.
    HttpClientFactory
    An implementation of BasePooledObjectFactory for HttpClient.
    KafkaSchemaRegistryConfigurationKeys
    Configuration keys for a kafka schema registry
    KafkaSchemaRegistryFactory
    A Factory that constructs and hands back KafkaSchemaRegistry implementations.
    LiKafkaSchemaRegistry
    Integration with LinkedIn's implementation of a schema registry that uses md5-hash for schema ids.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SchemaRegistryException
